This wooden Cornhole set is built using all wood materials to provide the ultimate Cornhole experience. The games are handcrafted from 100% wood as they do not include any composite materials or plastics. The 4’ x 2’ size is made to ACA regulations. The top surface is 1/2” varnished cabinet-grade plywood (ACA regulation), which provides the perfect amount of slide. Both sizes are made using handcrafted pine wood frames, featuring mitered corner joints. The wooden legs are retractable and are held in place by robust 3/8” galvanized steel bolts with wing nuts. Also included are 8 regulation size all-weather CornHole Bags which measure 6” x 6” and weigh 1 pound each. These bags are filled with recycled plastic pellets, but unlike corn, they will not rot if they get wet. Overall this is a well-built Cornhole set for Cornhole enthusiast. Portable set weighs about 38 pounds.
